description: Improve your saws and tinkers with automated processes to help shred your foes.
name: automated butchery

talents.info_text:
You attune your saws to a specific target for 5 turns.

Each time you strike this target all damage done with steamsaws (including by other talents) is increased by +7%, +11%, +14%, +17%, +19%.

If you strike any other foe the bonus ends.

Metal your foes to death!
talents.name: Continuous Butchery

talents.info_text:
You send a saw mounted on an automated steam propulsor to assault a foe, dealing 41, 56, 67, 76, 85 physical damage each turn for 4 turns and silencing it.

At the end of the duration, the saw explodes for 213, 288, 346, 395, 439 fire damage and flies back, pulling the target up to 5, 7, 8, 8, 9 tiles towards you.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
talents.name: Explosive Saw

talents.info_text:
When you kill a foe with a melee strike you quickly throw some of their remains in your steam engine, instantly regenerating 3, 6, 9, 11, 13 steam.

When you deal a critical melee strike you also have a 12%, 21%, 27%, 31%, 34% chance to cut a part of your foe and use it in your steam engine.

When either of those happens this strikes fear in all foes in radius 4 of the victim, brainlocking them for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

To the meat grinder!
talents.name: Mow Down

talents.info_text:
You override all security measures of your tinkers, allowing you to reset the cooldown of 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 of most of your steamtech talents of tier 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 or less and instantly increases your steam level by 12%, 23%, 31%, 38%, 45% of the maximum.

In addition for 6 turns your maximum steam capacity is doubled, but steam regeneration is halved.

Master of Tech, Master of Death!
talents.name: Tech Overload

description: Use small automated devices to control the battlefield.
name: automation

talents.info_text:
Sends a pulse detonator to the target. Upon arrival it explodes in radius 4 cone, dealing 151, 204, 246, 280, 311 physical damage, knocking back foes by 3 and dazing them for 1, 3, 3, 5, 7 turns.

Damage increases with your steampower.
talents.name: Pulse Detonator

talents.info_text:
You send a small steam-powered flying grapple to a target. The drone is homing so if the target moves it will follow.

When it reaches its target it deploys grapples in all directions around it in radius 4.

The grapples latch onto any foes and pull them toward the target. If they are stopped by a creature (or the target) both them and the creature take 117, 158, 190, 217, 241 physical damage.
talents.name: Flying Grapple

talents.info_text:
Sends a lightly electrified net of radius 2 toward a target, all creatures caught inside will be pinned in place for 5 turns.

While the electricity is not enough to do damage it does shock their body, reducing all resistances by 33%, 41%, 50%, 58%, 67%.
talents.name: Net Projector

talents.info_text:
For 4 turns many small saws circle around the target in radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, making any creature caught inside bleed for 124, 167, 201, 230, 255 physical damage.

Damage increases with your steampower.
talents.name: Sawfield

description: Using various enhancements of your cloak you are able to manage incoming damage.
name: avoidance

talents.info_text:
You tessellate your cloak with small pieces of metal, providing 24, 33, 39, 45, 50 damage reduction against all attacks.

The myriad metal scraps also help against incoming projectiles, providing a 34%, 43%, 49%, 55%, 60% chance of deflecting them to a nearby spot.
talents.name: Automated Cloak Tessellation

talents.info_text:
With a gesture of your cloak, you drop a small incendiary device in front of you, creating a wall of thick steam of 3, 5, 5, 7, 9 length that burns creatures passing it for 158, 213, 257, 293, 326 fire damage and blocks sight for 5 turns.

At level 5 the action is so perfect that your foes even lose track of you entirely.

Damage increases with your steampower.
talents.name: Cloak Gesture

talents.info_text:
Your cloak is lined with an automated health system that activate when no enemies are visible.

When it triggers, you will be healed for 164, 222, 267, 305, 339 life.

At talent level 3, it will also remove one detrimental physical effect.

The system can only trigger once every 9, 7, 6, 6, 5 turns.
talents.name: Embedded Restoration Systems

talents.info_text:
Trigger an array of small mirrors to appear all over your cloak.

The mirrors are positioned to reflect all light shining on you, granting 96, 130, 157, 179, 199 stealth power for 10 turns.

Stealth power increases with your steampower.
talents.name: Cloaking Device

description: Use steam powered engines to tilt the battle in your favour.
name: battle machinery

talents.info_text:
Throw a small, unstable steam engine on the battlefield that will go critical after 2 turns.

It will then create an explosion of hot vapour in radius 1, 2, 2, 2, 3, burning all foes for 199, 269, 324, 370, 411 fire damage.

Any bleeding foe caught in the flames will take 40% more damage.

Damage scales with your Steampower.

Tick Tock Tick BOOM!
talents.name: Explosive Steam Engine

talents.info_text:
Explosive Steam Engine vapour now lingers for 5 turns.

Each turn, bleeding foes inside the cloud will take 54, 73, 87, 100, 111 fire damage.

Any steamtech-using creature will also regenerate 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 additional steam per turn while inside the cloud.

Damage scales with your Steampower.

Modern technology at the service of burnination!
talents.name: Lingering Cloud

talents.info_text:
Throw a tremor engine on the battlefield that will trigger after 2 turns.

For 5 turns after triggering, it will constantly shake the ground and stun, pin, or disarm any creature in radius 1, 2, 2, 2, 3 for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The ground is mere paper to you!
talents.name: Tremor Engine

talents.info_text:
On its last pulse, your Tremor Engine shakes violently, raising a volcano for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

Each turn, the volcano will send out fiery boulders that deal 65, 88, 106, 121, 135 fire and 65, 88, 106, 121, 135 physical damage.

Damage scales with your Steampower.

All the fury of fire at your disposal!
talents.name: Seismic Activity

description: Use steam powered saws to maneuver around the battlefield, gaining strategic advantage.
name: battlefield management

talents.info_text:
Firmly plant your steamsaws in the ground, using them to propel yourself very quickly (+312%, +387%, +446%, +495%, +539% movement speed).

Any foes on either side of your movement get wrecked by the saws, knocking them 3 tiles away from you.

Attacking or using any talent will break this effect.

When this effect is broken or cancelled the sudden change in motion deals 148%, 169%, 184%, 197%, 209% weapon damage to all foes around you. To do full damage you need to have moved at least 5 times, otherwise damage is lower (or null for no movement).

The wheels of death! Amazing!
talents.name: Saw Wheels

talents.info_text:
Spin your saws wildly around you to create a wall of steamy sawteeth.

All melee damage against you is reduced by 12%, 17%, 21%, 24%, 26%, you have 12%, 17%, 21%, 24%, 26% chance to evade projectiles and you can never take a blow that deals more than 96%, 82%, 75%, 70%, 67% of your max life.

Split their bones on the saws of death!
talents.name: Grinding Shield

talents.info_text:
Slam your saws into your target, dealing 100% weapon damage + 11%, 19%, 25%, 29%, 32% per physical, magical, or mental effect on them (up to 7 effects).

Sustains are not effects.

The Metal Punisher!
talents.name: Punishment

talents.info_text:
You have lived through many battles, and your experience makes you a gritty veteran.

Saw Wheels end of effect attack increased by 11%, 18%, 24%, 29%, 33%.

Grinding Shield lets you live below your normal limits, up to -74, -144, -197, -243, -282 life.

Punishment has a 34%, 54%, 69%, 82%, 94% chance to have its cooldown reduced by 1 for each effect.

Domination for all!
talents.name: Battlefield Veteran

description: All this metalworking has improved you.
name: blacksmith

talents.info_text:
Working iron has honed your body into an amazing shape, granting 2, 4, 7, 9, 12 strength and constitution.

At talent level 5, you are so incredibly built that you gain one size category.
talents.name: Massive Physique

talents.info_text:
Working long hours at a forge has made you incredibly slow to tire and given you endless vitality.

Your healing factor is increased by 2%, 4%, 7%, 9%, 12% and your life regeneration by 1.20, 2.40, 3.60, 4.80, 6.00.

Stopping you is nearly impossible; your pinning resistance is increased by 18%, 36%, 53%, 72%, 90%.
talents.name: Endless Endurance

talents.info_text:
Slaving for many years at the forge has made you more resilient to physical pain and fire burns.

Your fire resistance is increased by 6%, 12%, 18%, 24%, 30% and your physical resistance by 3%, 7%, 10%, 14%, 18%.

At talent level 5, you are so accustomed to the flames that you become immune to the fireburn effect.
talents.name: Life in the Flames

talents.info_text:
You can easily see the weak points in your enemy's defenses. After all, you know to look for the same flaws in your own work.

This grants 4, 9, 14, 19, 24 armour penetration and 6%, 12%, 18%, 24%, 30% critical strike multiplier.

At talent level 5, you can also fight stealthed and invisible creatures without penalty.
talents.name: Craftsman's Eye

description: Use various kinds of technology to temporarily enhance your bullets.  (Learning these talents allow you to fire two steamguns at once.)
name: bullets mastery

talents.info_text:
By sending a stream of hot steam over your bullets you overheat them. For the next 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns, each bullet will set the target ablaze, making it burn for 100, 135, 162, 185, 205 fire damage over 5 turns (most of your shooting talents fire two bullets at once).

Damage will increase with Steampower.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
talents.name: Overheat Bullets

talents.info_text:
You are able to polish your bullets so well they can go through multiple targets for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

This also improves their armour penetration by 18, 24, 28, 31, 34.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
talents.name: Supercharge Bullets

talents.info_text:
You swap your bullets for more massive ones for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

When striking a creature, these bullets have a 31%, 38%, 44%, 49%, 53% chance of knocking it back 3 tiles and a 14%, 19%, 24%, 29%, 33% chance of stunning it for 3 turns.

The chances to knockback and stun increase with your Steampower.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
talents.name: Percussive Bullets

talents.info_text:
You coat your bullets with flammable materials, for the next 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns each bullet will explode when it hits its target, dealing 82, 111, 134, 153, 170 fire damage to all foes within radius 2 (most of your shooting talents fire two bullets at once).

Damage will increase with Steampower.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
talents.name: Combustive Bullets

description: Strap saws to your arms and rush into battle!
name: butchery

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 12, 24, 36, 48, 60 and increases weapon damage by 24%, 34%, 42%, 48%, 54% when using steamsaws.
talents.name: Steamsaw Mastery

talents.info_text:
Channel hot steam around your saws, burning foes you strike in melee for 77, 104, 125, 143, 158 fire damage over 3 turns (which can stack)!

Hot, steamy maiming!
talents.name: Overheat Saws

talents.info_text:
Continuously swing your steamsaws around you, dealing 30% weapon damage to adjacent foes each time you attack.

Your chaotic motions make it difficult for anything to hit you, granting 17%, 21%, 25%, 27%, 30% chance to completely negate all damage.

Damage avoidance chance increases with Steampower.

Make the metal talk!
talents.name: Tempest of Metal

talents.info_text:
You temporarily overcharge the saw motors, increasing the effective talent level of all saw talents by 25%, 29%, 32%, 34%, 36% for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The pain shall never stop!
talents.name: Overcharge Saws

description: Learn the chemistry side of steamtech.
name: chemistry

talents.info_text:
Allows you to create therapeutic tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 4, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Fungal Web

* Pain Suppressor Salve

* Second Skin

* Water Salve

* Poison Groove

* Fiery Salve

* Healing Salve

* Frost Salve

* Alchemist's Helper

* Botanical Shell

* Viral Injector

* Antimagic Shell

* Moss Tread

* Power Distributor

* Air Recycler

* Unstoppable Force Salve

* …perhaps more to discover…
talents.name: Therapeutics

talents.info_text:
Allows you to create chemical tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 4, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Black Light Emitter

* Corrosive Shell

* Toxic Shell

* Waterproof Coating

* Flash Powder

* Winterchill Edge

* Acid Groove

* Alchemist's Helper

* Rustproof Coating

* White Light Emitter

* Itching Powder

* Fireproof Coating

* …perhaps more to discover…
talents.name: Chemistry

talents.info_text:
Allows you to create explosive tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 4, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Flare Shell

* Headlamp

* Corrosive Shell

* Toxic Shell

* Steamgun

* Incendiary Groove

* Voltaic Shell

* Thunderclap Coating

* Hook Shell

* Botanical Shell

* Thunder Grenade

* Antimagic Shell

* Magnetic Shell

* Saw Shell

* Solid Shell

* Ablative Armour

* Explosive Shell

* Hand Cannon

* …perhaps more to discover…
talents.name: Explosives

talents.info_text: Increases the efficiency of all steamtech you operate, granting 18, 36, 53, 72, 90 steampower.
talents.name: Steam Power

description: Behold the mechanized horrors.
name: dread

talents.info_text:
Using psionic forces you maintain in place on your back two giant horrific mechanical arms.

Each basic turn (as if you had 100% speed) they can automatically attack up to 2 foes within range 3 with a mindstar attack doing 94%, 108%, 119%, 128%, 136% weapon damage.

Creatures harassed by the mechanical arms have their damage reduced by 11%, 20%, 25%, 29%, 32% for 5 turns.
talents.name: Mechanical Arms

talents.info_text:
Fire a powerful shot at a foe doing 198%, 219%, 234%, 247%, 259% weapon damage.

If the creature, or any creatures in radius 3, was affected by a fear or nightmare effect it violently wakes up, shaking it off only to find itself disoriented, unable to discern friends from foes for 3, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Lucid Shot

talents.info_text:
Fire a psionic-enhanced shot at a foe doing 79%, 91%, 100%, 108%, 115% mind weapon damage and infecting it with a psy worm for 8 turns.

Each turn the worm will do 29, 40, 47, 54, 60 mind damage and restore 1 psi to you, double if stunned or feared.

Also each turn the worm has 25% chances to spread to a nearby foe in radius 3.

When a creature infected by Psy Worm dies it spreads to all enemies in a radius of 3.
talents.name: Psy Worm

talents.info_text: Entering the mind of your foe you manipulate it to make it loose hope of defeating you, reducing all its damage by 40% for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.
talents.name: No Hope

description: Incredible feats of slipperiness!
name: elusiveness

talents.info_text:
Using small steam motors to enhance your movements, you are able to slip past up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 foes in a line.

After passing the targets, you will quickly run 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 tiles away.
talents.name: Slip Away

talents.info_text:
The thrill of the hunt invigorates you. For each foe in radius 2, 5, 7, 9, 11 around you, you gain 20% movement speed (up to 60%, 100%, 120%, 140%, 160%).

Current bonus: 0%.
talents.name: Agile Gunner

talents.info_text:
In an awesome feat of agility and technological prowess, you toss both of your steamguns in the air, causing them to spin madly for 3 turns.

Each turn, they will fire twice at random targets in range, dealing 148%, 169%, 184%, 197%, 209% weapon damage.

While the guns are airborne, you are disarmed and cannot attack.

The spectacle is so distracting that your foes have a hard time concentrating on you, increasing all of your resistances by 6%, 12%, 16%, 19%, 21%.
talents.name: Awesome Toss

talents.info_text:
While your foes are distracted by your Awesome Toss, you use powerful steam motors to jump into the air and kick a target 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 tiles away.

The impact is so great that it ripples outwards, slowing all creatures in radius 3 by 24%, 39%, 46%, 51%, 54% for 4 turns while the reaction force propels you 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 tiles backwards.
talents.name: Dazzling Jump

description: You don't just know how tinkering works, you know all the interesting details too!
name: engineering

talents.info_text:
You open all steam valves at once, releasing a radius 3 wave of superheated steam around yourself which deals 289, 392, 471, 538, 597 fire damage.

If you had at least 50 steam, the vapours will be so hot that they can burn sensory organs, blinding affected creatures for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

The effects scale with your current steam value; at 1 steam they are only 15% as effective as at 100 (current factor 100%).
talents.name: Emergency Steam Purge

talents.info_text:
Your knowledge of physical laws allows you to use and improve equipment in ways their creators never dreamed.

Increases all stats, saves, armour, and defense bonuses by 4%, 8%, 11%, 14%, 16% on equipment that is crafted by a master or powered by steamtech.
talents.name: Innovation

talents.info_text:
Using a huge amount of steam, you temporarily supercharge your tinkers and other steam-powered talents.

For 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, you gain 26, 32, 38, 44, 50 steampower and 5%, 10%, 15%, 19%, 23% steamtech critical chance.
talents.name: Supercharge Tinkers

talents.info_text:
Sometimes, being a master tinker requires taking risks; yours are more calculated than others.

Gain 2, 4, 7, 9, 12 cunning, 8, 14, 19, 24, 28 physical save, 20%, 33%, 42%, 49%, 54% resistance to self-inflicted damage, and 9%, 14%, 19%, 24%, 28% chance to avoid being critically hit.
talents.name: Last Engineer Standing

description: Harness the power of fire.
name: furnace

talents.info_text:
You add a portable furnace to your steam generators.

While it is active your fire and physical damage increases by 9%, 13%, 17%, 21%, 25% and your fire and physical resistance penetration by 9%, 13%, 17%, 21%, 25%.

Burninate all with awesome Steam power!
talents.name: Furnace

talents.info_text:
While Furnace is on your armour is so hot from the furnace it dissipates parts of all energy based attacks against you.

All non physical, non mind damage is reduced by 18, 26, 35, 43, 52 (current 18, 26, 35, 43, 52).

Each turn this happens you gain a molten point (up to 10), decreasing the efficiency of the reduction by 25%.

Molten points are removed upon running or resting.

Hot liquid metal, the fun!
talents.name: Molten Metal

talents.info_text:
Open the vents on your furnace, creating a conic blast dealing up to 268, 363, 437, 499, 554 fire damage at 10 molten points (currently 0.00).

All molten points are consumed.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.

By fire be purged!
talents.name: Furnace Vent

talents.info_text:
When you reach 10 molten points your armour overheats, reaching temperatures so high that they cauterize up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 detrimental physical effects on you.

A special medical injector injects you with a fire immunity serum at that precise moment to make you immune to the burning effect.

When this happens all molten points are consumed and trigger a Furnace Vent at the creature that triggered the last molten point.

This effect drains 15 steam when triggered, and will not trigger if steam is too low.

It's only a flesh burn!
talents.name: Melting Point

description: Use steam powered guns to rain bullets of death on your foes!  (Learning these talents allow you to fire two steamguns at once.)
name: gunner training

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 12, 24, 36, 48, 60 and increases weapon damage by 24%, 34%, 42%, 48%, 54% when using steamguns.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3.
talents.name: Steamgun Mastery

talents.info_text:
In an overpowering display of marksmanship, you fire your steamgun(s) twice in rapid succession.

Each shot (targeted separately) deals 44%, 54%, 62%, 68%, 74% damage and stuns its target for 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Steampower.
talents.name: Double Shots

talents.info_text:
You focus on managing your steamgun ammo for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

While the effect lasts your attacks do not consume shots.
talents.name: Uncanny Reload

talents.info_text:
You fire a special, electrically charged shot with your steamgun(s) at a spot within range.

When each shot reaches its target, it bursts into electrified shrapnel within radius 2, which shocks each target hit and deals 89%, 101%, 110%, 118%, 125% weapon damage as lightning.

Shocked targets lose up to 1 non-magical effects (for the first shot that hits).

This talent does not use ammo.
talents.name: Static Shot

description: Use advanced marksmanship to confound and overwhelm your foes!  (Learning these talents allow you to fire two steamguns at once.)
name: gunslinging

talents.info_text:
You have learned to fire while moving.

In one motion, you fire your double steamguns (100% weapon damage, 1 tile range penalty) and may then move to an adjacent tile (unless pinned to the ground or immobilized).

This talent can be activated for up to 1, 2, 3, 3, 3 consecutive turns before it goes on cooldown, and takes time according to your steamtech speed or movement speed (if you move), whichever is slower.

When Strafe ends you may instantly reload between 0 and 0 ammo (based on the number of strafes you performed and your ammo capacity).
talents.name: Strafe

talents.info_text:
You deliberately fire a missing shot at a target, startling it for 3 turns.

If the target fails a mental save it instinctively recoils two steps back.

The next shot that hits the startled creature will deal 223%, 253%, 277%, 296%, 314% more damage.
talents.name: Startling Shot

talents.info_text:
Using small engines to augment your reflexes you are able to automatically fire retaliatory shots at your foes doing 93%, 116%, 133%, 147%, 160% weapon damage.

Retaliation shots are fired when you evade/are missed by a melee or ranged attack.

This can only happen once per turn and uses shots as normal.
talents.name: Evasive Shots

talents.info_text:
Your cunning and dexterity allow you to fire incredible trick shots that can hit multiple targets.

You precisely aim your trick shot to ricochet amongst foes you can see so that whenever it hits something solid (creature or solid wall), it will bounce towards the next closest foe.

It may ricochet up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 times (or until it misses) within range 5 of your first target and will not target the same foe twice.

Your shot deals 99%, 115%, 127%, 138%, 147% weapon damage on its first strike, but loses 36%, 25%, 19%, 15%, 12% damage and 0(46%, 32%, 25%, 20%, 17%) accuracy with each bounce.
talents.name: Trick Shot

description: Control your mindstar and infuse it with steamtech.
name: mechstar

talents.info_text:
Quickly aggregate particles of metal around your mindstar and focus psionic energies into it.

The metal explodes like shrapnel, knocking back (3, 3, 4, 4, 5 away) and dazing (5, 7, 8, 9, 10 duration) all foes in radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8.
talents.name: Metalstar

talents.info_text:
When you fire your metalstar, your also establish a psionic bloodlink with the shrapnel still inside for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

Each turn the victims are drained for 27, 37, 45, 51, 57 physical damage, half of which heals you (each additional victim healing is reduced by half).

If the victim move more than twice away from the radius of Metalstar (currently 2) the effect stops.

This damage does not break daze and increases with your Steampower.
talents.name: Bloodstar

talents.info_text:
Your bloodstar effect also burns part of your victim's flesh, dealing 27, 37, 45, 51, 57 fire damage.

The intensity of the fire generates steam which you psionically absorb through gestalt, providing 4, 7, 9, 10, 12 steam each turn (each additional victim steam generation is reduced by 66%).

This damage does not break daze and increases with your Steampower.
talents.name: Steamstar

talents.info_text: When you use a shoot class talent to hit a creature affected by bloodstar an other shoot talent will have its current cooldown reduced by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 turns.
talents.name: Deathstar

description: Tinkers with stuff.
name: other

talents.info_text: Allows you to create tinkers.
talents.name: Create Tinker

talents.info_text: Deploy a Weapon Automaton based on a selected one handed melee item. The Automaton will wield the selected weapon and drop it when it times out or is destroyed. Aside from the weapon selected, the Automaton will scale off Tinker talent levels, your own stats, and other things that will be described in this tooltip at some point.
talents.name: Weapon Automaton: One Handed

talents.info_text:
Fires your ammo at an enemy in range 10 for 147%, 188%, 219%, 245%, 269% weapon damage. If this tinker is made of voratun you will fire an additional shot.

This shot is a ranged melee attack but will use the ranged procs of your ammo as well.
talents.name: Hand Cannon

talents.info_text:
Quickly create a psionic-enhanced metal contraption that lures all your foes to it and reflects 30% of the damage it takes to its attackers.

The contraption will have 696, 941, 1132, 1293, 1436 life and last 5 turns.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.
talents.name: Fatal Attractor

talents.info_text:
Activate the rocket boots, firing huge flames from your boots increasing your movement speed by 110%, 170%, 229%, 290%, 350%.

Each movement will leave a trail of flames doing 97, 131, 157, 180, 200 fire damage for 4 turns.

Doing any other actions will break the effect.

Burninate them all!
talents.name: Rocket Boots

talents.info_text:
Activate the pistons to crush your target for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns and dealing 164%, 182%, 196%, 208%, 218% unarmed melee damage.

While the target is held it can not move and its armour and defense are reduced by 33, 45, 55, 62, 69.

Crush their bones!
talents.name: Iron Grip

talents.info_text: Grab the target and pull them towards you, striking for 128%, 149%, 164%, 177%, 189% unarmed melee damage, and if you hit, pinning them for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns.
talents.name: Spring Grapple

talents.info_text:
Launch a cannister filled with toxic gas at a location.

Every 2 turns the cannister emits a poison cloud of radius 3 around it each turn.

The poison does 199, 269, 324, 370, 411 nature damage over 5 turns.

The cannister has 696, 941, 1132, 1293, 1436 life and lasts 8 turns. When it ends or is destroyed a last cloud is created.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.

Damage and penetration are inherited from the creator.
talents.name: Toxic Cannister Launcher

talents.info_text:
Activate the armour's active defense system.

A flow of electricity covers your armour to attenuate the force of energy attacks while small steam engines move key pieces of the armour to attenuate physical attacks.

All damage except mind damage is reduced by a flat 56, 76, 92, 105, 117.

In addition the electric power of the armour sometimes leaks, each turn there is a 50% chance to produce a electrical arc toward a foe, dealing 26, 35, 42, 48, 53 to 77, 104, 125, 143, 158 lightning damage to all foes in radius 1.

The effects increase with your Steampower.
talents.name: Steam Powered Armour

talents.info_text:
You fire a cone of blighted needles, hitting everything in a frontal cone of radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 for 77, 104, 125, 143, 158 physical damage.

Each creature hit has a 31%, 38%, 44%, 49%, 53% chance of being infected by a random disease, doing 20, 28, 33, 38, 42 blight damage and reducing either Constitution, Strength or Dexterity by 11, 16, 19, 22, 24 for 20 turns.

The damage and disease effects increase with your Steampower.
talents.name: Viral Needlegun

talents.info_text: You shred pieces of sandwalls. Brrrmmm!.
talents.name: Sand Shredder

talents.info_text:
Throw a cone of flame with radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
talents.name: Flamethrower

talents.info_text:
Throw a cone of healing with radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, healing other mechanical creatures (steam spiders) for 587, 795, 955, 1092, 1212.

The healing will increase with your Steampower.
talents.name: Mass Repair

talents.info_text:
Let out a technopsionic wave that silences for 3, 4, 5, 5, 5 turns all those affected in a radius of 5, 7, 9, 11, 12, including the user.

The silence chance will increase with your Steampower.
talents.name: Arcane Disruption Wave

talents.info_text:
Shatters the mind of your victim, giving you full control over its actions for 6 turns.

When the effect ends, you pull out your mind and the victim's body collapses, dead.

This effect does not work on rares, bosses, or undead.

.
talents.name: Mind Crush

talents.info_text:
Touch a creature to release a nasty electrical charge into them, doing 165, 223, 268, 306, 340 lightning damage.

If this tinker is above tier 1, the electricity can arc to another target up to 2 tiles away.

The number of enemies hit is at most the tinker tier.

The damage increases with your Steampower.
talents.name: Shocking Touch

talents.info_text:
Throw a handful of dust that rapidly oxidises, releasing a blinding light.

Creatures in a cone of radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 are blinded for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The blindness effect is applied with your Steampower.
talents.name: Flash Powder

talents.info_text:
Throw a handful of dust that is very itchy to touch.

Creatures in a cone of radius 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 are itchy for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns, causing them to fail talents 16%, 25%, 33%, 39%, 44% of the time.

The itchiness effect is applied with your Steampower.
talents.name: Itching Powder

talents.info_text:
Throw a grenade at your foes, dealing 165, 223, 268, 306, 340 physical damage in radius 1.

Creatures hit will also be stunned for 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 turns.

The stun effect is applied with your Steampower.
talents.name: Thunder Grenade

talents.info_text:
You activate hidden springs to project a saw towards your foes.

Any creature caught in the beam takes 303, 410, 493, 564, 626 physical damage and bleeds for half more in 5 turns.

The damage increases with your Steampower.
talents.name: Project Saw

talents.info_text:
Fires a bolt of lightning, doing 234, 316, 380, 434, 482 lightning damage.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
talents.name: Voltaic Bolt

talents.info_text:
Place an electrically charged sentry device at a location.

Every turn it will fire a bolt of electricity at a nearby enemy.

The bolts do 63, 86, 103, 118, 131 lightning damage.

The sentry has 696, 941, 1132, 1293, 1436 life and lasts 10 turns.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.

Damage and penetration are inherited from the creator.
talents.name: Voltaic Sentry

talents.info_text:
You fire a special explosive shot with your steamgun(s) at a spot within range.

When each shot reaches its target, it does normal steamgun damage and explodes within radius 1, which does 234, 316, 380, 434, 482 physical damage.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
talents.name: Explosive Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special explosive shot with your steamgun(s) at a spot within range.

When each shot reaches its target, it does normal steamgun damage and explodes within radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 3, which lights up the area and blinds for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
talents.name: Flare Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special explosive shot with your steamgun(s) at a spot within range.

When each shot reaches its target, it does normal steamgun damage and releases 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 explosive charges in a radius of 2.

These charges will shortly explode for 165, 223, 268, 306, 340 fire damage in a radius of 1.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
talents.name: Incendiary Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special solid shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 172%, 223%, 262%, 294%, 323% physical weapon damage.

The weight of the shot will knock the target back 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 tiles.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
talents.name: Solid Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special stake shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 172%, 223%, 262%, 294%, 323% physical weapon damage.

The weight of the shot will knock the target back 2 tiles and they will be pinned for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
talents.name: Impaler Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special steamsaw shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 172%, 223%, 262%, 294%, 323% physical weapon damage.

The steamsaw will cut into the target, doing 86%, 111%, 131%, 147%, 161% physical weapon damage over 5 turns.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
talents.name: Saw Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special hook shot with your steamgun(s) at a target creature or location.

If you target a creature, they are pulled up to 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 tiles towards you.

If you target an empty tile, you are pulled up to 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 tiles towards it.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
talents.name: Hook Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special magnetic shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for normal weapon damage.

The shot will magnetise the target for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns. This lowers their defense and increases fatigue by 73, 95, 113, 127, 140.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Effect strength scales with Steampower.
talents.name: Magnetic Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special voltaic shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 100% weapon damage as lightning.

The shot will release powerful electrical currents at up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 nearby enemies.

Each bolt does 165, 223, 268, 306, 340 lightning damage.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Bolt damage scales with Steampower.
talents.name: Voltaic Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special antimagic shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 100% normal weapon damage.

The shot will release antimagic sap on the target, doing 165, 223, 268, 306, 340 arcane resource burn damage.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Sap damage scales with Steampower.
talents.name: Antimagic Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special botanical shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 100% weapon damage as nature.

The shot will release spores which grow into Nourishing Moss in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 1, 2 for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Each turn the moss deals 24, 33, 40, 45, 51 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

This moss has vampiric properties and heals the user for 65%, 83%, 97%, 108%, 117% of the damage done.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Moss damage scales with Steampower.
talents.name: Botanical Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special corrosive shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 147%, 188%, 219%, 245%, 269% weapon damage as acid.

The acid released by the shot will also corrode the target, reducing its accuracy, defense and armour by 40, 51, 60, 67, 73.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Corrosion strength scales with Steampower.
talents.name: Corrosive Shell

talents.info_text:
You fire a special toxic shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 100% weapon damage as blight.

The shot will release heavy metals into the target, inflicting 41, 52, 60, 67, 74 blight damage per turn and reducing their global speed by 30%, 41%, 50%, 57%, 63% for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Toxin strength scales with Steampower.
talents.name: Toxic Shell

talents.info_text:
For 8, 10, 12, 14, 16 turns, you lay down Grasping Moss where you walk or stand.

The moss is placed automatically every step and lasts 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Each turn the moss deals 24, 33, 40, 45, 51 nature damage to each foe standing on it.

This moss is very thick and sticky causing all foes passing through it have their movement speed reduced by 38%, 48%, 54%, 60%, 64% and have a 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 49% chance to be pinned to the ground for 4 turns.

The damage scales with your Steampower.
talents.name: Moss Tread

description: Tinkers with stuff.
name: other

talents.info_text: The medical urgency vest allows using therapeutics with 0% efficiency and cooldown mod of 100%.
talents.name: Medical Urgency Vest

talents.info_text: The life support suit allows using therapeutics with 0% efficiency and cooldown mod of 100%.
talents.name: Life Support

description: Learn the mechanical side of steamtech.
name: physics

talents.info_text:
Allows you to create smithed tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 4, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Viral Needlegun

* Silver Filigree

* Spike Attachment

* Mana Coil

* Steamgun

* Incendiary Groove

* Winterchill Edge

* Acid Groove

* Crystal Edge

* Razor Edge

* Viral Injector

* Focus Lens

* Steamsaw

* Fatal Attractor

* Rustproof Coating

* Solid Shell

* Crystal Plating

* Armour Reinforcement

* Grounding Strap

* Ablative Armour

* Toxic Cannister Launcher

* Shocking Edge

* Back Support

* Weapon Automaton: One Handed

* Saw Projector

* …perhaps more to discover…
talents.name: Smith

talents.info_text:
Allows you to create mechanical tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 4, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Spring Grapple

* Kinetic Stabiliser

* Rocket Boots

* Hook Shell

* Steamsaw

* Saw Shell

* Fatal Attractor

* Air Recycler

* Voltaic Sentry

* Iron Grip

* Hand Cannon

* Back Support

* Weapon Automaton: One Handed

* Saw Projector

* …perhaps more to discover…
talents.name: Mechanical

talents.info_text:
Allows you to create electrical tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 4, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Black Light Emitter

* Mana Coil

* Voltaic Shell

* Magnetic Shell

* Fatal Attractor

* White Light Emitter

* Power Distributor

* Grounding Strap

* Voltaic Sentry

* Galvanic Retributor

* Shocking Touch

* Mental Stimulator

* Shocking Edge

* Deflection Field

* Lightning Coil

* Weapon Automaton: One Handed

* …perhaps more to discover…
talents.name: Electricity

talents.info_text: Increases the capacity of your steam tank by 6, 12, 18, 24, 30.
talents.name: Compact Steam Tank

description: Meld your psionic powers with awesome steamtech! For mayhem!
name: psytech gunnery

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 12, 24, 36, 48, 60 and increases weapon damage by 24%, 34%, 42%, 48%, 54% when using steamguns.

When your bullets hit a target your instinctively reach out to the impact and use the kinetic force to project a mindstar attack doing 158%, 194%, 222%, 246%, 267% damage (guaranteed hit), if you wield one in the offhand.

This projection requires a pure mindstar, it will no work if extended into a psiblade.

Also activable for a shoot that deals 138%, 159%, 174%, 187%, 199% weapon damage as mind damage.
talents.name: Psyshot

talents.info_text:
Using psionic energies you overheat your shot, making it deal 138%, 163%, 181%, 197%, 211% damage.

If the shot hits a wet foe it will vaporize, removing the wet effect and dealing 268, 363, 437, 499, 554 fire damage in a radius 4.
talents.name: Boiling Shot

talents.info_text: Fire a relatively low-powered shot at a foe doing 98%, 119%, 134%, 147%, 159% weapon damage, if it hits a cone-shaped shockwave of radius 4 emanates from the impact, stunning it and all creatures caught inside for 3, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Blunt Shot

talents.info_text:
Attach a psionic steam device to a shot doing 163%, 186%, 203%, 217%, 230% weapon damage.

When it hits a foe the device activates, violently sucking all the air nearby, pulling in all creatures in radius 3, 5, 6, 6, 7.
talents.name: Vacuum Shot

description: Use steam powered saws to their maximum efficiency! Main! Cut! Shred!
name: sawmaiming

talents.info_text:
Hits the target on the arms with one rotating saw doing 129%, 141%, 150%, 158%, 165% damage and trying to maim it for 2, 3, 3, 3, 4 turns.

Maimed foes deal 22%, 32%, 36%, 39%, 41% less damage.

The chance improves with your Physical power.

Cutting your foes has never been so simple!
talents.name: To The Arms

talents.info_text:
You "gently" slam your saws into the wounds of a creature, dealing 69%, 85%, 97%, 108%, 117% weapon damage and deepening the wounds.

All bleeding wounds durations are increased by 1, 1, 1, 1, 2 turns and the damage by 164%, 222%, 267%, 305%, 339% (this may be done only once per bleeding effect).

When this happens a gush of blood is projected in a narrow cone of radius 4, dealing 151, 204, 246, 280, 311 physical damage to all creatures.

The power and damage improves with your Steampower.

The marvels of technology, now at the service of true butchery!
talents.name: Bloodstream

talents.info_text:
You try to sever the spine of your foe, reducing its global speed by 25%, 40%, 46%, 49%, 51% for 4 turns and dealing 104%, 122%, 136%, 148%, 158% weapon damage.

The power of the blow also removes up to 1 physical effects.

If your talent level is at least 3 1 physical or magical sustains are also removed.

Break them, grind them, mow them down!
talents.name: Spinal Break

talents.info_text:
When you kill a foe you place small explosives with shrapnels inside its body, making it explode in radius 5.

Any foes hit will bleed for 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 damage per turn for 6 turns. The shrapnels also damage the vocal cords (or related organ), silencing them for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

Use the finest of wartech now: shrapnels. For blood and mayhem!
talents.name: Goresplosion

description: Apply some of your formidable willpower through steam devices.
name: thoughts of iron

talents.info_text:
Using psionic energies you temporarily alter your blood, turning it into molten iron.

When affected by molten blood all creatures that hit you in melee take 31, 42, 50, 57, 64 fire damage, all your resistances are increased by 6%, 12%, 16%, 19%, 21% and all new detrimental effects on you have their duration reduced by 7%, 16%, 21%, 24%, 26%.

Damage increases with your Steampower.
talents.name: Molten Iron Blood

talents.info_text:
Melding psionics with steamtech you create 5 mind drones at your sides that fly towards your target.

If they encounter a creature they will latch on it and bore into its skull for 6 turns, disrupting its thoughts.

Disrupted creatures have 20%, 27%, 31%, 34%, 36% chances to fail to use talents and suffer a -37%, -58%, -62%, -64%, -65% reduction to fear and sleep immunity.
talents.name: Mind Drones

talents.info_text:
You cleanse your mind of 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 mental debuffs.

Cleansed effects will be randomly sent to closeby foes (range 5, subject to a mental save).
talents.name: Psionic Mirror

talents.info_text: By using a direct psionic link to your body you can use even more therapeutics. 0% efficiency and 100% cooldown mod.
talents.name: Mind Injection
